channel.title: Cooking
channel.description:
Well, I need a rotation int for the Item On Item packet. I am trying to code cooking, but I have no idea how the variable for the item's rotation works. If anyone has a source that has cooking and has it displayed like this: [img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/4747/shrimpsq.jpg[/img]
You would need to search for something like... [code=Java]sendItemOnInterface(1743, x, shrimps);[/code]
Where 1743 is cooking interface, x is rotation, and shrimps is raw shrimp id. If it was coded sufficiently, shrimps shouldn't be an actual number. For example mine is: [code=Java]sendItemOnInterface(1743, x, f.getRaw());[/code]
